jobs.title: React Js Developer
jobs.description: You’ll be expected to lead the company’s entire react js developers. You’ve to work on.
requirements: Strong proficiency in JavaScript, including DOM manipulation and the JavaScript object model
Thorough understanding of React.js and its core principles
Experience with popular React.js workflows (such as Flux or Redux)
Familiarity with newer specifications of EcmaScript
Experience with data structure libraries (e.g., Immutable.js)
Knowledge of isomorphic React is a plus
Familiarity with RESTful APIs
Familiarity with modern front-end build pipelines and tools
Experience with common front-end development tools such as Babel, Webpack, NPM, etc.
Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements

jobs.title: Digital Marketing Lead
jobs.description: Digital Marketing Manager acts as a digital expert and will be playing a key role.
requirements: Proven working experience in digital marketing
Demonstrable experience leading and managing SEO/SEM, marketing database, email, social media, and/or display advertising campaigns
Highly creative with experience in identifying target audiences and devising digital campaigns that engage, inform, and motivate
Solid knowledge of website analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics, NetInsight, Omniture, WebTrends)
Experience in setting up and optimizing Google Adwords campaigns
Strong analytical skills and data-driven thinking
Up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in online marketing and measurement

jobs.title: Magento Developer
jobs.description: A Magento Developer is responsible for designing and developing robust.
requirements: Strong object-oriented programming knowledge
Very good PHP knowledge
Experience with the Zend Framework
Experience with the Magento platform
Experience with the Magento 2 platform is a plus
Strong experience with the LAMP stack
Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git, SVN)
Experience with web services (SOAP, REST)

jobs.title: DevOps Engineer
jobs.description: In this role, you’ll work collaboratively with software engineering to deploy, manage and troubleshoot staging and production systems.
requirements: Strong background in Linux/Unix Administration
Experience with automation/configuration management using Ansible, Puppet, Chef, or an equivalent
Experience with AWS cloud services
Experience with Docker and Kubernetes
Experience with monitoring systems (e.g., Nagios, Zabbix, Prometheus)
Experience with CI/CD pipelines and tools (e.g., Jenkins, Travis CI, CircleCI)
Solid scripting skills (e.g., shell scripts, Python, Ruby)
Experience in Agile/Scrum methodologies

jobs.title: Specialist Vendor Management
jobs.description: Identify and track vendor KPIs against daily, weekly and monthly targets
requirements: Proven experience in vendor management or similar role
Strong analytical skills with the ability to collect, organize, analyze, and disseminate significant amounts of information with attention to detail and accuracy
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
Proficiency in MS Office and vendor management software
Ability to work well with tight deadlines in a fast-paced environment

jobs.title: Node Js Developer
jobs.description: Writing reusable, testable, and efficient code. Develop new features and improve existing features of the software
requirements: Strong proficiency with JavaScript
Knowledge of Node.js and frameworks available for it (such as Express.js)
Understanding the nature of asynchronous programming and its quirks and workarounds
Good understanding of server-side templating languages
Good understanding of server-side CSS preprocessors
Basic understanding of front-end technologies, such as HTML5, and CSS3
Understanding accessibility and security compliance
User authentication and authorization between multiple systems, servers, and environments
Integration of multiple data sources and databases into one system
Understanding fundamental design principles behind a scalable application

jobs.title: UI/UX Designer
jobs.description: As a UI/UX Designer, you will be responsible for creating visually stunning and user-friendly interfaces for our web and mobile applications.
requirements: Proven experience as a UI/UX Designer or similar role
Portfolio of design projects
Proficiency in design software (e.g., Adobe XD, Sketch, Figma)
Strong understanding of user-centered design principles
Solid knowledge of responsive design techniques
Ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams
Excellent communication skills
Up-to-date knowledge of design trends and best practices

jobs.title: Data Scientist
jobs.description: As a Data Scientist, you will analyze complex datasets to uncover valuable insights that drive business decisions and improve our products and services.
requirements: Advanced degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or related field
Proven experience as a Data Scientist or similar role
Proficiency in statistical analysis tools (e.g., R, Python)
Experience with machine learning techniques and algorithms
Strong problem-solving skills
Excellent communication and presentation abilities
Ability to work independently and in a team environment

jobs.title: Product Manager
jobs.description: As a Product Manager, you will be responsible for defining the product vision, strategy, and roadmap. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to deliver innovative products that meet customer needs and drive business growth.
requirements: Proven experience as a Product Manager or similar role
Strong understanding of product management principles and practices
Excellent leadership and communication skills
Ability to develop product strategy and roadmap
Experience with Agile development methodologies
Ability to prioritize and manage multiple projects simultaneously
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Passion for building great products
